pr_title: Add delay before running maintenance the first time

timeline.message:
Add delay before running maintenance the first time

Unit tests depend on files not being deleted immediately after
FilesArchived has been started

timeline.bodyText:
Sounds like imperfect unit tests.
Is the delay a little short ?
timeline.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: Running the test failed every time for me until I added the delay and worked every time afterwards. On a fast machine I guess it usually works.
replies.author: hmusum
